channel.title: Age of Ravens: Citybooks of Splendors
channel.description: On the Gauntlet Blog today I revisit an older post and my accumulated reviews of Flying Buffalo's _Citybook_ series. Originally I'd put this post together boost the Bundle of Holding's offer in support of Rick Loomis' cancer treatment. However Mr. Loomis passed away over the weekend. The BoH bundle continues on, with funds going to support Mr. Loomis' family. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/age-of-ravens-citybooks-of-splendors

item.title: Age of Ravens: Citybooks of Splendors
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the Gauntlet Blog today I revisit an older post and my accumulated reviews of Flying Buffalo’s Citybook series. Originally I’d put this post together boost the Bundle of Holding’s offer in support of Rick Loomis’ cancer treatment. However Mr. Loomis passed away over the weekend. The BoH bundle continues on, with funds going to support Mr. Loomis’ family.

THE GAUNTLET

Age of Ravens: Citybooks of Splendors

Originally I'd put this post together to help boost the Bundle of Holding's offer in support of Rick Loomis' cancer treatment. However Mr. Loomis passed away over the weekend. In a bitter twist of...
